name: Unforgiven VR
description: Conquer the west by becoming the best duelist ever. Unforgiven brings you the thrill and tension of a true western VR duel. Face another player in an experience where a split second can decide who lives and who dies. Thrive in the ruthless social world of Unforgiven and become a true legend.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64Bits Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64Bits Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE required
